verses.verse: And Mosheh <S%H4872><s%> with the elders <S%H2205><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> <S%H8762><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, Keep <S%H8104><s%> <S%H8800><s%> all the Mitzvot <S%H4687><s%> which I command <S%H6680><s%> <S%H8764><s%> you this day <S%H3117><s%>.

And it shall be on the day <S%H3117><s%> when ye shall pass over <S%H5674><s%> <S%H8799><s%> Yarden <S%H3383><s%> unto the land <S%H776><s%> which the YY <S%H3068><s%> thy 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> giveth <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8802><s%> thee, that thou shalt set thee up <S%H6965><s%> <S%H8689><s%> great <S%H1419><s%> stones <S%H68><s%>, and plaister <S%H7874><s%> <S%H8804><s%> them with plaister <S%H7875><s%>:

And thou shalt write <S%H3789><s%> <S%H8804><s%> upon them all the words <S%H1697><s%> of this Torah <S%H8451><s%>, when thou art passed over <S%H5674><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, that thou mayest go in <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto the land <S%H776><s%> which the YY <S%H3068><s%> thy 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> giveth <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8802><s%> thee, a land <S%H776><s%> that floweth <S%H2100><s%> <S%H8802><s%> with milk <S%H2461><s%> and honey <S%H1706><s%>; as the YY <S%H3068><s%> 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> of thy fathers <S%H1><s%> hath promised <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8765><s%> thee.

Therefore it shall be when ye be gone over <S%H5674><s%> <S%H8800><s%> Yarden <S%H3383><s%>, that ye shall set up <S%H6965><s%> <S%H8686><s%> these stones <S%H68><s%>, which I command <S%H6680><s%> <S%H8764><s%> you this day <S%H3117><s%>, in mount <S%H2022><s%> Ebal <S%H5858><s%>, and thou shalt plaister <S%H7875><s%> them with plaister <S%H7874><s%> <S%H8804><s%>.

And there shalt thou build <S%H1129><s%> <S%H8804><s%> an altar <S%H4196><s%> unto the YY <S%H3068><s%> thy 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>, an altar <S%H4196><s%> of stones <S%H68><s%>: thou shalt not lift up <S%H5130><s%> <S%H8686><s%> any iron <S%H1270><s%> tool upon them.

Thou shalt build <S%H1129><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the altar <S%H4196><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> thy 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> of whole <S%H8003><s%> stones <S%H68><s%>: and thou shalt offer <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8689><s%> burnt offerings <S%H5930><s%> thereon unto the YY <S%H3068><s%> thy 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>:

And thou shalt offer <S%H2076><s%> <S%H8804><s%> peace offerings <S%H8002><s%>, and shalt eat <S%H398><s%> <S%H8804><s%> there, and rejoice <S%H8055><s%> <S%H8804><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%> thy 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>.

And thou shalt write <S%H3789><s%> <S%H8804><s%> upon the stones <S%H68><s%> all the words <S%H1697><s%> of this Torah <S%H8451><s%> very <S%H3190><s%> <S%H8687><s%> plainly <S%H874><s%> <S%H8761><s%>.

And Mosheh <S%H4872><s%> and the Kohanim <S%H3548><s%> the L'vi'im <S%H3881><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8762><s%> unto all Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, Take heed <S%H5535><s%> <S%H8685><s%>, and hearken <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8798><s%>, O Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>; this day <S%H3117><s%> thou art become <S%H1961><s%> <S%H8738><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> thy 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>.

Thou shalt therefore obey <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the voice <S%H6963><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> thy 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>, and do <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> his Mitzvot <S%H4687><s%> and his statutes <S%H2706><s%>, which I command <S%H6680><s%> <S%H8764><s%> thee this day <S%H3117><s%>.
And Mosheh <S%H4872><s%> charged <S%H6680><s%> <S%H8762><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> the same day <S%H3117><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>,

These shall stand <S%H5975><s%> <S%H8799><s%> upon mount <S%H2022><s%> Gerizim <S%H1630><s%> to bless <S%H1288><s%> <S%H8763><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%>, when ye are come over <S%H5674><s%> <S%H8800><s%> Yarden <S%H3383><s%>; SHim`on <S%H8095><s%>, and Levi <S%H3878><s%>, and Y'hudah <S%H3063><s%>, and Yissakhar <S%H3485><s%>, and Yosef <S%H3130><s%>, and Binyamin <S%H1144><s%>:

And these shall stand <S%H5975><s%> <S%H8799><s%> upon mount <S%H2022><s%> Ebal <S%H5858><s%> to curse <S%H7045><s%>; Re'uven <S%H7205><s%>, Gad <S%H1410><s%>, and Asher <S%H836><s%>, and Z'vulun <S%H2074><s%>, Dan <S%H1835><s%>, and Naftali <S%H5321><s%>.

And the L'vi'im <S%H3881><s%> shall speak <S%H6030><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, and say <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> unto all the men <S%H376><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> with a loud <S%H7311><s%> <S%H8802><s%> voice <S%H6963><s%>,

Cursed <S%H779><s%> <S%H8803><s%> be the man <S%H376><s%> that maketh <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> any graven <S%H6459><s%> or molten image <S%H4541><s%>, an abomination <S%H8441><s%> unto the YY <S%H3068><s%>, the work <S%H4639><s%> of the hands <S%H3027><s%> of the craftsman <S%H2796><s%>, and putteth <S%H7760><s%> <S%H8804><s%> it in a secret <S%H5643><s%> place. And all the people <S%H5971><s%> shall answer <S%H6030><s%> <S%H8804><s%> and say <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, Amen <S%H543><s%>.

Cursed <S%H779><s%> <S%H8803><s%> be he that setteth light <S%H7034><s%> <S%H8688><s%> by his father <S%H1><s%> or his mother <S%H517><s%>. And all the people <S%H5971><s%> shall say <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, Amen <S%H543><s%>.

Cursed <S%H779><s%> <S%H8803><s%> be he that removeth <S%H5253><s%> <S%H8688><s%> his neighbour's <S%H7453><s%> landmark <S%H1366><s%>. And all the people <S%H5971><s%> shall say <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, Amen <S%H543><s%>.

Cursed <S%H779><s%> <S%H8803><s%> be he that maketh the blind <S%H5787><s%> to wander <S%H7686><s%> <S%H8688><s%> out of the way <S%H1870><s%>. And all the people <S%H5971><s%> shall say <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, Amen <S%H543><s%>.

Cursed <S%H779><s%> <S%H8803><s%> be he that perverteth <S%H5186><s%> <S%H8688><s%> the judgment <S%H4941><s%> of the stranger <S%H1616><s%>, fatherless <S%H3490><s%>, and widow <S%H490><s%>. And all the people <S%H5971><s%> shall say <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, Amen <S%H543><s%>.

Cursed <S%H779><s%> <S%H8803><s%> be he that lieth <S%H7901><s%> <S%H8802><s%> with his father's <S%H1><s%> wife <S%H802><s%>; because he uncovereth <S%H1540><s%> <S%H8765><s%> his father's <S%H1><s%> skirt <S%H3671><s%>. And all the people <S%H5971><s%> shall say <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, Amen <S%H543><s%>.

Cursed <S%H779><s%> <S%H8803><s%> be he that lieth <S%H7901><s%> <S%H8802><s%> with any manner of beast <S%H929><s%>. And all the people <S%H5971><s%> shall say <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, Amen <S%H543><s%>.

Cursed <S%H779><s%> <S%H8803><s%> be he that lieth <S%H7901><s%> <S%H8802><s%> with his sister <S%H269><s%>, the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of his father <S%H1><s%>, or the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of his mother <S%H517><s%>. And all the people <S%H5971><s%> shall say <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, Amen <S%H543><s%>.

Cursed <S%H779><s%> <S%H8803><s%> be he that lieth <S%H7901><s%> <S%H8802><s%> with his mother in Torah <S%H2859><s%> <S%H8802><s%>. And all the people <S%H5971><s%> shall say <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, Amen <S%H543><s%>.

Cursed <S%H779><s%> <S%H8803><s%> be he that smiteth <S%H5221><s%> <S%H8688><s%> his neighbour <S%H7453><s%> secretly <S%H5643><s%>. And all the people <S%H5971><s%> shall say <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, Amen <S%H543><s%>.

Cursed <S%H779><s%> <S%H8803><s%> be he that taketh <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8802><s%> reward <S%H7810><s%> to slay <S%H5221><s%> <S%H8687><s%> an innocent <S%H5355><s%> person <S%H5315><s%> <S%H1818><s%>. And all the people <S%H5971><s%> shall say <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, Amen <S%H543><s%>.

Cursed <S%H779><s%> <S%H8803><s%> be he that confirmeth <S%H6965><s%> <S%H8686><s%> not all the words <S%H1697><s%> of this Torah <S%H8451><s%> to do <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8800><s%> them. And all the people <S%H5971><s%> shall say <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, Amen <S%H543><s%>.
